title: Storybook Configuration
description: Add Storybook configuration to a UI library or an application.

uiFramework.x-prompt: What UI framework plugin should storybook use?

configureCypress.x-prompt: Configure a cypress e2e app to run against the storybook instance?

cypressDirectory.description: A directory where the Cypress project will be placed. Added at root by default.

linter.description: The tool to use for running lint checks.

projectBuildConfig.description: Provide a custom projectBuildConfig for the Angular executor. If left blank, Nx will use the default.

js.description: Generate JavaScript files rather than TypeScript files.

standaloneConfig.description: Split the project configuration into `<projectRoot>/project.json` rather than including it inside `workspace.json`.
